title: Please Help
body: i dont know why when i loading game and i disconect . THAT BUGSLPAT . OMG BEFORE I DISCONECT LIKE THATAND I GET LEAVEBUSTER . THAT NOT MY FAUL . PLEASE TEACH ME HOW CAN I FIX THAT . I REALLY ANGRY WHEN I LOST A GAME WIT MY TEAM AND THEY ALL REPORT ME .

replies.body: That's really frustrating, I would be angry too!  These busplats usually happen when a driver, hardware, or game file problem fails to render your game properly.  It would be a good idea to stick to custom games for now to prevent further penalties, and go over each step of the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to fix this up.
